name: Targus AMW01US Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: [Accuracy - The latest 27MHz wireless technology with 800-dpi high resolution offers extremely reliable data transmission and accurate cursor movement, Portability - Offers intelligent power management with a small stow/away thumb-size USB receiver that doubles as an on/off switch when stored; receiver tucks inside of mouse during travel, Rechargeable – Recharges via the USB cable which allows mouse to be operable while charging, no more dead batteries, True Plug and Play – No need to install drivers or software, simply connect via the USB port]
